entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing rain. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
